title: Jungle Stay in Nilgiris with All Meals Included
description: Disconnect from the rest of the world and immerse yourself in the lush rainforest of Nilgiris, Tamil Nadu with an exclusive stay at Wild Planet Jungle Resort. An uncompromising eco-adventure of unexpected urban comfort, Wild Planet is an intimate and secluded resort surrounded by nature, only accessible to its privileged guests. Enjoy a fairy-tale stay here with splendid views over the wilderness, including daily breakfast, lunch and dinner, with one romantic candlelit dinner during your stay.
offer_address: Near Bandipur & Mudumalai Tiger Reserve, Nilgiris, Kerala - Tamil Nadu Border, South India
